verses.verse: The <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> were gathered <S%H6817>together,<s%> and <S%H5674>passed<s%> <S%H6828>northward;<s%> and they <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3316>Jephthah,<s%> "Why did you pass <S%H5674>over<s%> to <S%H3898>fight<s%> against the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon,<s%> and <S%H7121>didn't<s%> call us to <S%H3212>go<s%> with <S%H8313>you?<s%> We will burn your <S%H1004>house<s%> around you with <S%H784>fire!<s%>"

<S%H3316>Jephthah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H5971>them,<s%> "I and my people <S%H1961>were<s%> at <S%H3966>great<s%> <S%H376>strife<s%> with the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon;<s%> and when I <S%H2199>called<s%> <S%H3467>you,<s%> you didn't save me out of their <S%H3027>hand.<s%>

When I <S%H7200>saw<s%> that you <S%H3467>didn't<s%> save <S%H7760>me,<s%> I put my <S%H5315>life<s%> in my <S%H3709>hand,<s%> and passed <S%H5674>over<s%> against the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon,<s%> and <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H5414>delivered<s%> them into my <S%H3027>hand.<s%> Why then have you come <S%H5927>up<s%> to me this <S%H3117>day,<s%> to fight against <S%H3898>me?<s%>"

Then <S%H3316>Jephthah<s%> gathered <S%H6908>together<s%> all the <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead,<s%> and <S%H3898>fought<s%> with <S%H669>Ephraim;<s%> and the <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead<s%> <S%H5221>struck<s%> <S%H669>Ephraim,<s%> because they <S%H559>said,<s%> "You are <S%H6412>fugitives<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim,<s%> you <S%H1568>Gileadites,<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim,<s%> and in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh.<s%>"

The <S%H1568>Gileadites<s%> <S%H3920>took<s%> the <S%H4569>fords<s%> of the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> against the <S%H669>Ephraimites.<s%> It was <S%H6412>so,<s%> that when the fugitives of <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "Let me go <S%H5674>over,<s%>" the <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H673>him,<s%> "Are you an Ephraimite?" If he <S%H559>said,<s%> "No;"

then they <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H559>him,<s%> "Now say <S%H7641><s%> 'Shibboleth;'" and he <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H5451>"Sibboleth;<s%>" for he <S%H3559>couldn't<s%> manage to <S%H1696>pronounce<s%> it <S%H3559>right:<s%> then they <S%H270>siezed<s%> <S%H7819>him,<s%> and killed him at the <S%H4569>fords<s%> of the <S%H3383>Jordan.<s%> At that <S%H6256>time,<s%> <S%H705>forty<s%> - <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> <S%H5307>fell.<s%>

<S%H3316>Jephthah<s%> <S%H8199>judged<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H8141>years.<s%> Then <S%H3316>Jephthah<s%> the <S%H1569>Gileadite<s%> <S%H4191>died,<s%> and was <S%H6912>buried<s%> in the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead.<s%>

He had <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H1121>sons;<s%> and <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H1323>daughters<s%> he <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H2351>abroad,<s%> and <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H1323>daughters<s%> he <S%H935>brought<s%> in from <S%H2351>abroad<s%> for his <S%H1121>sons.<s%> He <S%H8199>judged<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H8141>years.<s%>
<S%H356>Elon<s%> the <S%H2075>Zebulunite<s%> <S%H4191>died,<s%> and was <S%H6912>buried<s%> in <S%H357>Aijalon<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H2074>Zebulun.<s%>

He had <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%> and <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%>' sons, who <S%H7392>rode<s%> on <S%H7657>seventy<s%> donkey <S%H5895>colts:<s%> and he <S%H8199>judged<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H8083>eight<s%> <S%H8141>years.<s%>

<S%H5658>Abdon<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1985>Hillel<s%> the <S%H6553>Pirathonite<s%> <S%H4191>died,<s%> and was <S%H6912>buried<s%> in <S%H6552>Pirathon<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim,<s%> in the <S%H2022>hill<s%> country of the <S%H6003>Amalekites.<s%>
